pt.ua.dicoogle.server.web.servlets

Class SettingsServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • HttpServlet
      • pt.ua.dicoogle.server.web.servlets.SettingsServlet
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class SettingsServlet
extends HttpServlet
    Handles requests for applying the general/advanced Dicoogle Settings.

      • getHTMLIndexingAdvancedSettingsForm

        public static java.lang.String getHTMLIndexingAdvancedSettingsForm(HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                   java.lang.String brokerURL,
                                                                   java.lang.String elementID)
                                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Based on the request, returns a String containing a form with all the settings inputs boxes regarding the indexing options. These boxes are rendered/specified in accordance with the each setting value type reported by the plugin/service.
        Parameters:
        request - the servlet request object.
        brokerURL - the URL of the broker that will apply the settings after receiving this forms post.
        elementID - the ID of this HTML form, can be null.
        Returns:
        a String containing the HTML structure for the form with all the settings.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getHTMLAccessListSettingsForm

        public static java.lang.String getHTMLAccessListSettingsForm(HttpServletRequest request,
                                                             java.lang.String brokerURL,
                                                             java.lang.String elementID)
                                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Based on the request, returns a String containing a form with all the settings inputs boxes regarding the Dicoogle Access List settings. These boxes are rendered/specified in accordance with the each setting value type reported by the plugin/service.
        Parameters:
        request - the servlet request object.
        brokerURL - the URL of the broker that will apply the settings after receiving this forms post.
        elementID - the ID of this HTML form, can be null.
        Returns:
        a String containing the HTML structure for the form with all the settings.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getHTMLGlobalTransferStorageSettingsForm

        public static java.lang.String getHTMLGlobalTransferStorageSettingsForm(HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                        java.lang.String brokerURL,
                                                                        java.lang.String elementID)
                                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Based on the request, returns a String containing a form with all the settings inputs boxes regarding the Dicoogle Global SOP Classes Transfer Storage settings. These boxes are rendered/specified in accordance with the each setting value type reported by the plugin/service.
        Parameters:
        request - the servlet request object.
        brokerURL - the URL of the broker that will apply the settings after receiving this forms post.
        elementID - the ID of this HTML form, can be null.
        Returns:
        a String containing the HTML structure for the form with all the settings.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
